Method.name: InsertStuSQL
Method.Implementation: &SQL( INSERT INTO SCHOOL.Student ( STU_Name, STU_Age, STU_Sex ) VALUES ( :stuName, :age, :sex ) ) q:(SQLCODE '= 0) SQLCODE q %ROWID

Method.name: InsertSubjSQL
Method.Implementation: &SQL( INSERT INTO SCHOOL.StuScore ( STUS_PARREF, STUS_Subject, STUS_Score ) VALUES ( :stuId, :subject, :score ) ) q:(SQLCODE '= 0) SQLCODE q %ROWID

Method.name: UpdateScoreSQL
Method.Implementation: &SQL( UPDATE SCHOOL.StuScore SET STUS_Score = :score WHERE STUS_RowId = :stusId ) q:(SQLCODE '= 0) SQLCODE q %ROWID
